Question
========

The diameter of bottle caps has a normal distribution with a mean of 36 mm and a standard deviation of 1 mm. Suppose you take random samples of 10, 20 and 40. Which sample distribution best approximates the normal distribution?

Answerlist
----------

* 10
* 20
* 40
* All three are equally good.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 10:Incorrect
* 20: Incorrect
* 40: Correct
* All three equally correct: Incorrect
